Articles.Content:
Using .90 with active texture manager. No matter what I do it crashes to desktop, here's how my gamedata folder is setup.

link to crash folder: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/fzuxk8fqpbw2jnp/AAADHk-jdOpk8Wwcu1Ompqkxa?dl=0

You're running out of memory:

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!Trying to allocate: 5592404B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete

Allocation happend at: Line:0 in Overloaded New[]

Memory overview

[ ALLOC_DEFAULT ] used: 334208408B | peak: 0B | reserved: 347040834B

[ ALLOC_GFX ] used: 770007380B | peak: 0B | reserved: 801787436B

[ ALLOC_CACHEOBJECTS ] used: 222888B | peak: 0B | reserved: 12582912B

[ ALLOC_TYPETREE ] used: 0B | peak: 0B | reserved: 0B

[ ALLOC_PROFILER ] used: 102348B | peak: 0B | reserved: 8388608B

Could not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Trying to allocate: 5592404B with 4 alignment. MemoryLabel: NewDelete

Allocation happend at: Line:0 in Overloaded New[]

Memory overview

[ ALLOC_DEFAULT ] used: 334208408B | peak: 0B | reserved: 347040834B

[ ALLOC_GFX ] used: 770007380B | peak: 0B | reserved: 801787436B

[ ALLOC_CACHEOBJECTS ] used: 222888B | peak: 0B | reserved: 12582912B

[ ALLOC_TYPETREE ] used: 0B | peak: 0B | reserved: 0B

[ ALLOC_PROFILER ] used: 102348B | peak: 0B | reserved: 8388608B

Your options are:

  • Switch to ATM-aggressive if you're running ATM-basic
  • Increase the scale setting in KSP\GameData\ActiveTextureManagement\settings.cfg (4 should work, but you may need 8)
  • Remove parts of some mods, especially KSOS
  • Switch to Linux so you can run that (less unstable) 64-bit version

  • Increase the scale setting in KSP\GameData\ActiveTextureManagement\settings.cfg (4 should work, but you may need 8)
  • Remove parts of some mods, especially KSOS
  • Switch to Linux so you can run that (less unstable) 64-bit version
